languages.text: {n}Пленник завершает свою неторопливую песнь и довольно улыбается.{/n} "Я сам сочинил эту вису. Для брата, павшего век назад. Он был хорошим воином, и умер он тоже хорошо. И виса получилась славная".

{n}The prisoner slowly brings his song to a close and smiles in satisfaction.{/n} "I crafted those verses myself. For a brother who fell a century ago. He was a good warrior, and he had a good death. And his saga turned out fine indeed."
languages.original_text: {n}Пленник завершает свою неторопливую песнь и довольно улыбается.{/n} "Я сам сочинил эту вису. Для брата, павшего век назад. Он был хорошим воином, и умер он тоже хорошо. И виса получилась славная".

traits.locale_text: {n}The prisoner slowly brings his song to a close and smiles in satisfaction.{/n} "I crafted that visa myself. For a brother who fell a century ago. He was a good warrior, and he had a good death. And his visa turned out fine indeed."
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}囚犯慢慢地唱完了歌之后，满意地笑了。{/n}“这首史诗是我自己精心撰写的，为我一个世纪前阵亡的兄弟创作的。他是位出色的战士，死得也很光荣。他的史诗确实很动人。”
languages.original_text: {n}The prisoner slowly brings his song to a close and smiles in satisfaction.{/n} "I crafted those verses myself. For a brother who fell a century ago. He was a good warrior, and he had a good death. And his saga turned out fine indeed."

traits.locale_text: {n}囚犯慢慢地唱完了歌之后，满意地笑了。{/n}“这首史诗是我自己精心撰写的，为我一个世纪前阵亡的兄弟创作的。他是位出色的战士，死得也很光荣。他的史诗确实很动人。”
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}囚人はゆっくりと歌を終え、満足げに微笑んだ。{/n}「今の詩は俺が書いた。1世紀前に戦地で倒れた兄弟に捧げた歌だ。彼は良き戦士で、死に際も見事だった。おかげでいいサーガが作れた」
languages.original_text: {n}The prisoner slowly brings his song to a close and smiles in satisfaction.{/n} "I crafted those verses myself. For a brother who fell a century ago. He was a good warrior, and he had a good death. And his saga turned out fine indeed."

traits.locale_text: {n}囚人はゆっくりと歌を終え、満足げに微笑んだ。{/n}「今の詩は俺が書いた。1世紀前に戦地で倒れた兄弟に捧げた歌だ。彼は良き戦士で、死に際も見事だった。おかげでいいサーガが作れた」
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}El prisionero termina su canción y sonríe, satisfecho.{/n} «Esas estrofas son de cosecha propia. Están dedicadas a un hermano que murió hace un siglo. Era un gran guerrero y tuvo una gran muerte. Y su saga también ha sido grandiosa».
languages.original_text: {n}The prisoner slowly brings his song to a close and smiles in satisfaction.{/n} "I crafted those verses myself. For a brother who fell a century ago. He was a good warrior, and he had a good death. And his saga turned out fine indeed."

traits.locale_text: {n}El prisionero termina su canción y sonríe, satisfecho.{/n} «Ese visa es de cosecha propia. Está dedicado a un hermano que murió hace un siglo. Era un gran guerrero y tuvo una gran muerte. Y su visa también ha sido grandioso».
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Le prisonnier achève sa chanson, un sourire satisfait aux lèvres.{/n} « J'ai moi-même composé ces vers pour un frère tombé il y a un siècle. C'était un bon guerrier qui a eu droit à une belle mort, et sa saga est plutôt réussie. »
languages.original_text: {n}The prisoner slowly brings his song to a close and smiles in satisfaction.{/n} "I crafted those verses myself. For a brother who fell a century ago. He was a good warrior, and he had a good death. And his saga turned out fine indeed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le prisonnier achève sa chanson, un sourire satisfait aux lèvres.{/n} « J'ai moi-même composé ce vísa pour un frère tombé il y a un siècle. C'était un bon guerrier qui a eu droit à une belle mort, et son vísa est plutôt réussi. »
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Der Gefangene beendet langsam sein Lied und lächelt zufrieden.{/n} "Ich habe diese Verse selbst geschmiedet. Für einen Bruder, der vor einem Jahrhundert gefallen ist. Er war ein guter Krieger und hatte einen guten Tod. Und seine Saga ist wirklich gut geworden."
languages.original_text: {n}The prisoner slowly brings his song to a close and smiles in satisfaction.{/n} "I crafted those verses myself. For a brother who fell a century ago. He was a good warrior, and he had a good death. And his saga turned out fine indeed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Gefangene beendet langsam sein Lied und lächelt zufrieden.{/n} "Ich habe diese Visa selbst geschaffen. Für einen Bruder, der vor einem Jahrhundert gefallen ist. Er war ein guter Krieger und hatte einen guten Tod. Und sein Visa ist wirklich schön geworden."
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.original_text: {n}The prisoner slowly brings his song to a close and smiles in satisfaction.{/n} "I crafted those verses myself. For a brother who fell a century ago. He was a good warrior, and he had a good death. And his saga turned out fine indeed."

languages.text: {n}Yavaşça şarkısını sona erdiren mahkûm, memnuniyetle gülümsüyor.{/n} "Bu dizeleri bizzat besteledim. Bir asır önce canından olan bir kardeşime... İyi bir savaşçıydı, iyi bir ölüme kavuştu. Destanı da bir o kadar iyi oldu."
languages.original_text: {n}The prisoner slowly brings his song to a close and smiles in satisfaction.{/n} "I crafted those verses myself. For a brother who fell a century ago. He was a good warrior, and he had a good death. And his saga turned out fine indeed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mahkûm, yavaşça şarkısını sona erdirerek memnuniyetle gülümsüyor.{/n} "Bu dizeleri bizzat besteledim. Bir asır önce canından olan bir kardeşim için... İyi bir savaşçıydı ve iyi bir ölüme kavuştu. Destanıysa hakikaten bir o kadar iyi oldu."
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison
